name: Dungeons Of Duality
description:
You Crawl through a dungeon to revive your lost love. On the Way You have to make a few tough choices.


Playing the standalone version is recommended. 

All Assets randing from audio, textures, scripts, music, models, maps and sprites were made by me, Except the following:

bones sound:

https://freesound.org/people/Finnssound/sounds/660683/

skybox:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...

font for title:

https://www.fontspace.com/old-english-gothic-pixel-font-f83405

help menu horizontal slider:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/pagedrect-paging-galleries-and-m... (Highly Highly recommend + Its free!)

Disclaimer: Although this game may take inspiration from religious imagery, it is in no way intended to be a promotion or a mockery of any system of belief.
